mapper.select: SELECT rownum, a.address_no, a.address_alias, a.address_name, a.address_tel, a.zone_code, a.road_add, a.detail_add, a.default_add FROM address a where a.user_no = 1 order by a.default_add desc, a.address_no asc
SELECT address_no, address_alias, address_name, address_tel, zone_code, road_add, detail_add FROM address where user_no = 1 AND address_no = #{address_no}
SELECT address_alias, address_name, address_tel, zone_code, road_add, detail_add FROM address where user_no = 1 AND default_add = #{default_add}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO address(address_no, user_no, address_alias, address_name, address_tel, zone_code, road_add, detail_add)
VALUES ((select nvl(max(address_no), 0) + 1 from address), 1, #{address_alias}, #{address_name}, #{address_tel}, #{zone_code}, #{road_add}, #{detail_add} )
mapper.update: update address set default_add = 'N' WHERE default_add = 'Y' AND user_no = 1
